baseRule.text: 若比丘尼。共比丘尼鬪諍相瞋。自打身啼者。波夜提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 92

fullParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī attānaṁ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodeyya, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 20

translations.text: Welche Nonne sich aber selbst immer wieder schlägt und dann weint, muß dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni weep, beating and beating herself, it is to be confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang menangis, memukul dan memukuli dirinya sendiri, itu harus di akui.

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，共鬪諍，不善憶持諍事，搥胸啼哭者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 89

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼與人鬪已。自打啼哭。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 132

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼瞋恚故。便自椎胸生苦痛者波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 90

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。自打而啼泣淚者波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 88
